VoiceName.label: Voice Name
VoiceName.tooltip: Set the voice to use for TTS

Volume.label: Volume
Volume.tooltip: Set the volume of the TTS

Rate.label: Speaking Rate
Rate.tooltip: Set the speaking rate of the TTS

MaxCharacters.label: Maximum Characters
MaxCharacters.tooltip: Set the maximum number of characters in a TTS message. Use 0 for no limit.

MaxCharacterMessage.value: {user}, your message was too long for text-to-speech.
MaxCharacterMessage.label: Maximum Characters Message
MaxCharacterMessage.tooltip:
The message that the bot will read a tts message contains more than the max characters. 
 {user} = username

TTSCommandPermission.label: Permission level
TTSCommandPermission.tooltip: Set the permission level for the command

TTSCommandPermissionInfo.label: Permission level info
TTSCommandPermissionInfo.tooltip: Set the user, rank, or tier for permission

TTSCommandMessage.label: TTS Message Format
TTSCommandMessage.tooltip:
The message that the bot will read when the command is used. 
 {user} = username
 {message} = the chat message

TTSUseCD.label: Use Cooldown Message
TTSUseCD.tooltip: Enable to display a message when the TTS command is on cooldown.

TTSOnCooldown.value: {user} the command is still on cooldown for {cooldown} seconds!
TTSOnCooldown.label: Cooldown Response
TTSOnCooldown.tooltip:
The message that the bot will display when the command is on cooldown. 
 {user} = username
 {cooldown} = time remaining

TTSOnUserCooldown.value: {user} the command is still on user cooldown for {cooldown} seconds!
TTSOnUserCooldown.label: User Cooldown Response
TTSOnUserCooldown.tooltip:
The message that the bot will display when the command is on user cooldown.
 {user} = username
 {cooldown} = time remaining

TTSAllChat.label: TTS All Chat Messages
TTSAllChat.tooltip: Enable to use text-to-speech for all messages

TTSAllChatExcludeCommands.label: Exclude Reading Commands
TTSAllChatExcludeCommands.tooltip: Exclude reading messages that start with an exclamation point (!).

TTSAllChatMessage.label: TTS Message Format
TTSAllChatMessage.tooltip:
The message that the bot will read for every chat message. 
 {user} = username
 {message} = the chat message

TTSOverlayExcludeAlerts.label: Exclude Alerts from Overlay
TTSOverlayExcludeAlerts.tooltip: Enable to not display alert text-to-speech on the overlay.

TTSOverlayMessage.label: Overlay Message Format
TTSOverlayMessage.tooltip:
The message that the bot will display on the overlay for tts command and chat messages.
NOTE: This does not apply for alert tts.
 {user} = username
 {message} = the chat message

TTSOverlayTime.label: Seconds to Display
TTSOverlayTime.tooltip: The number of seconds to display the message

TTSOverlayUseFontOutline.label: Use Font Outline
TTSOverlayUseFontOutline.tooltip: Enable to use the below font outline color on the overlay.

TTSOverlayUseFontShadow.label: Use Font Shadow
TTSOverlayUseFontShadow.tooltip: Enable to use the below font shadow color on the overlay.

TTSOverlayFontSize.label: Font Size
TTSOverlayFontSize.tooltip: The size of the font in the overlay.

TTSOverlayFont.label: Font Family
TTSOverlayFont.tooltip: The font family for the text. The font has to be available on your system.

TTSOverlayUseBackground.label: Use Background Color
TTSOverlayUseBackground.tooltip: Enable to use the below background color on the overlay.

TTSOverlayUseBorder.label: Use Border Color
TTSOverlayUseBorder.tooltip: Enable to use the below border color on the overlay.

TTSOverlayHorizontalAlign.label: Horizontal Align
TTSOverlayHorizontalAlign.tooltip: Select where (horizontally) the overlay appears in the browser source.

TTSOverlayVerticalAlign.label: Vertical Align
TTSOverlayVerticalAlign.tooltip: Select where (vertically) the overlay appears in the browser source.

TTSOverlayAnimateIn.label: Animate In
TTSOverlayAnimateIn.tooltip: Select the animation to apply when the text appears

TTSOverlayAnimateOut.label: Animate Out
TTSOverlayAnimateOut.tooltip: Select the animation to apply when the text disappears

OpenAnimateDemo.label: Open Animation Demo
OpenAnimateDemo.tooltip: Opens the demo website for the animations

OpenOverlayFolder.label: Open Overlay Folder
OpenOverlayFolder.tooltip: Opens the overlay folder for this script

TwitchOnCheer.label: Enabled
TwitchOnCheer.tooltip: Check this to enable TTS for cheer alerts

TwitchIncludeCheerMessage.label: Include Message
TwitchIncludeCheerMessage.tooltip: Check this to enable TTS for messages included with bit alerts

TwitchCheerMinimum.label: Minimum Bits for TTS
TwitchCheerMinimum.tooltip: Minimum bits to read the alert

TwitchCheerDelay.label: Delay (seconds)
TwitchCheerDelay.tooltip: Number of seconds to delay reading the alert

TwitchCheerMessage.label: Bits Alert Message
TwitchCheerMessage.tooltip:
The alert format.
{name} = Cheerer Username
{amount} = Number of bits
{isPlural} = Adds an 's' if amount > 1

TwitchOnFollow.label: Enabled
TwitchOnFollow.tooltip: Check this to enable TTS for follow alerts

TwitchFollowDelay.label: Delay (seconds)
TwitchFollowDelay.tooltip: Number of seconds to delay reading the alert

TwitchOnHost.label: Enabled
TwitchOnHost.tooltip: Check this to enable TTS for host alerts

TwitchHostMinimum.label: Minimum Viewers for TTS
TwitchHostMinimum.tooltip: Minimum viewers to read the alert

TwitchHostDelay.label: Delay (seconds)
TwitchHostDelay.tooltip: Number of seconds to delay reading the alert

TwitchHostMessage.label: Host Alert Message
TwitchHostMessage.tooltip:
The alert format.
{name} = Host Username
{amount} = Number of viewers
{isPlural} = Adds an 's' if amount > 1

TwitchOnRaid.label: Enabled
TwitchOnRaid.tooltip: Check this to enable TTS for raid alerts

TwitchRaidMinimum.label: Minimum Raiders for TTS
TwitchRaidMinimum.tooltip: Minimum raiders to read the alert

TwitchRaidDelay.label: Delay (seconds)
TwitchRaidDelay.tooltip: Number of seconds to delay reading the alert

TwitchRaidMessage.label: Raid Alert Message
TwitchRaidMessage.value: {name} has raided you with a party of {amount}.
TwitchRaidMessage.tooltip:
The alert format.
{name} = Raider Username
{amount} = Number of raiders

TwitchOnSub.label: Enabled
TwitchOnSub.tooltip: Check this to enable TTS for subscriber alerts

TwitchIncludeSubMessage.label: Include Message
TwitchIncludeSubMessage.tooltip: Check this to enable TTS for subscriber messages included with alerts

TwitchSubDelay.label: Delay (seconds)
TwitchSubDelay.tooltip: Number of seconds to delay reading the alert

TwitchSubMessage.label: Sub (1 month) Alert Message
TwitchSubMessage.tooltip:
The alert format.
{name} = Sub Username
{tier} = Subscription tier (Prime, Tier 1, 2, 3)

TwitchResubMessage.label: Resubscriber Alert Message
TwitchResubMessage.tooltip:
The alert format.
{name} = Sub Username
{tier} = Subscription tier (Prime, Tier 1, 2, 3)
{months} = Number of months subscribed

TwitchGiftMessage.label: Gift Sub Alert Message
TwitchGiftMessage.value: {gifter} has gifted a sub ({tier}) to {name} ({months} month{isPlural}).
TwitchGiftMessage.tooltip:
The alert format.
{gifter} = Gifter's Username
{name} = Sub Username
{tier} = Subscription tier (Prime, Tier 1, 2, 3)
{months} = Number of months subscribed
{isPlural} = Adds an 's' if months > 1

TwitchGiftMassMessage.label: Gift Multiple Subs Alert Message
TwitchGiftMassMessage.value: {gifter} has gifted {amount} subs to the channel: {recipients}.
TwitchGiftMassMessage.tooltip:
The alert format when someone gifts more than 1 sub.
{gifter} = Gifter's Username
{amount} = Number of Subs
{recipients} = A comma-delimited list of users that received the gifted subs

BanUserCommand.label: Command Name
BanUserCommand.tooltip:
The command used to ban or unban users from triggering TTS.
Bans if the user is not already in the file
Unbans if the user is already banned.

BanUserCommandPermission.label: Permission level
BanUserCommandPermission.tooltip: Set the permission level for the command

BanUserCommandPermissionInfo.label: Permission level info
BanUserCommandPermissionInfo.tooltip: Set the user, rank, or tier for permission

OpenBannedUserFile.label: Open users.txt
OpenBannedUserFile.tooltip: Opens the text file of banned users

BanUserAddResponse.label: User Banned Response
BanUserAddResponse.tooltip:
The message sent when a user is banned.
{user} = The user that called the command
{banned} = The user that was banned

BanUserRemoveResponse.label: User Unbanned Response
BanUserRemoveResponse.tooltip:
The message sent when a user is banned.
{user} = The user that called the command
{banned} = The user that was unbanned

BanWordCommand.label: Command Name
BanWordCommand.tooltip:
The command used to ban or unban words in TTS.
Bans if the word is not already in the file
Unbans if the word is already banned.

BanWordCommandPermission.label: Permission level
BanWordCommandPermission.tooltip: Set the permission level for the command

BanWordCommandPermissionInfo.label: Permission level info
BanWordCommandPermissionInfo.tooltip: Set the user, rank, or tier for permission

BannedAction.label: Banned Words Setting
BannedAction.tooltip: Customize how banned words are handled.

BannedMatchWholeWord.label: Match Whole Words Only
BannedMatchWholeWord.tooltip:
Check this to only look for banned words rather than partial words.
For example, if 'fu' is a banned word and the message contains 'fudge'
 When Checked: The message is NOT flagged as containing a banned word
 When Not Checked: The message is flagged as containing a bad word

BannedReplacement.label: Banned Word Replacement
BannedReplacement.tooltip: The text used to replace banned words.

OpenBannedWordFile.label: Open banned.txt
OpenBannedWordFile.tooltip: Opens the text file of banned words

BanWordAddResponse.label: Word Banned Response
BanWordAddResponse.tooltip:
The message sent when a word or phrase is banned.
{user} = The user that called the command
{word} = The word that was banned

BanWordRemoveResponse.label: Word Unbanned Response
BanWordRemoveResponse.tooltip:
The message sent when a word or phrase is banned.
{user} = The user that called the command
{word} = The word that was unbanned

OpenTwitter.label: Original Author Twitter Kruiser8
OpenTwitter.tooltip: Opens the Twitter for the original author

OpenReadMe.label: Open README.txt
OpenReadMe.tooltip: Opens the README.txt for this script
